name: The White House
address: 26/5 Đỗ Quang Đẩu, Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
description:
Tọa lạc tại thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, The White House Do Quang Dau có khu vườn, sân hiên và khu vực tiếp khách chung. Khách sạn cách Bảo tàng Mỹ thuật khoảng 1,3 km và Chợ ẩm thực đường phố Bến Thành 1,4 km. Khách sạn cũng cung cấp dịch vụ lễ tân 24 giờ và Wi-Fi miễn phí.

Các phòng tại khách sạn được trang bị tủ quần áo, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với vòi sen. Một số phòng của The White House Do Quang Dau còn có khu vực ghế ngồi.

Đi xe đạp là hoạt động được yêu thích trong khu vực và du khách có thể thuê xe đạp/xe máy tại đây.

The White House Do Quang Dau cách Công viên Tao Đàn 1,4 km, trung tâm thương mại Takashimaya Việt Nam 1,5 km và sân bay gần nhất là sân bay quốc tế Tân Sơn Nhất 13 km.

review.comment_positive:

review.comment_positive: Host was very supportive at all times during our stay and helped us with good recommendations. The location is awesome, quiet as it is in a small alley but yet in the middle of the buzz of the city. Room was very clean and the bathroom was nicely updated. Good value for the money, we will definitely consider to come again.

The staff especially Tai was extremely helpful and went out of his way to make my stay the best that it can be giving me recommendations for food and even ordering me a cheap grab to the airport. Rooms also quite nice with every amenity you can imagine. Would go there again if in Ho Chi Minh.

I stayed here a few years ago in a Standard room.
At that time the standard room had a desk, chair , balcony and included breakfast
This time only a standard room was advertised so I naturally chose that as I thought it would be the same so didn't read the description very carefully.
Unfortunately now the standard room has none of desk, chair, balcony or breakfast. 
So compared to the previous time I was a little disappointed 
The staff did provide me with a stool so I managed to use my computer using the refrigerator as a desk top.

review.rating: A great choice for Ho Chi Minh city
review.comment_positive: No hesitation to give The White House a 10. Our stay exceeded our expectations on every level. Great communication with Tai before we arrived, and then he was delightful and super helpful while we stayed. His  map was very useful and he helped with getting about and onward travel. The rooms were spotlessly clean and comfortable.  Lovely bathroom. The location was good, easy to get about, but tucked down a side street, so not too noisy. Lots of restaurants and shops close by. Great value too. Highly recommended.  Would definitely stay again.

The receptionists were extremely friendly and supportive, especially Tai who helped us in every way. The room and lobby are impeccably clean and orderly. It's like a five-star hotel with its cleanliness and the amenities for a price of a 3-star one. I was trying to look for a loophole but I wasn't. This is by far the best hotel I've checked in. For the first time, I don't have complains. I only have praises and commendations to the staff and the entire hotel experience.

I had troubles with my bags at the airport Thai and his colleagues went out their way to help me during my stay. He even gave me his number so I could call him if I had any issues in the future for my stay in Vietnam.  The service and friendliness of everyone at The White House set the bar for the rest of my trip in Vietnam. I cannot recommend the Hotel enough.

I highly appreciated this. The room was very good standard, very clean, with comfortable bed and good quality equipment including A/C, several lighting options, refrigerator, electric kettle and hair dryer. The guesthouse is located close to the party street, yet the rooms are very quiet and with windows (small balconies) providing for natural light. The bus station is just around the corner and all attractions can be reached on foot.

review.rating: truelly the best & cheapest place to rent in HCMC
review.comment_positive: The new White Guest house in Ho Chi Minh City Vietnam is an hidden jewel by all means. A family business who deeply care about their reputation and the comfort of the guests. Two young students highly intelligent and updated with all knowledge regarding the needs of costumer although very young but extremely professional who are always back up by their kind- and warm-hearted mother make living in Ho Chi Minh City like home absolutely perfect. As I had negative experiences with my previous hosts, I could not find a thing which was not perfect in White guest house by now. The white house is a Very new house very environmentally friendly build system though the light in the rooms, with beautifully made bath room in a  tropical rain shower style for just few dollars per night. People who know me they are aware I make my reviews very accurate to the facts, and The White Guest house in Saigon is the top of all I saw by now. I can 100% recommend but they have only 10 rooms so don`t miss it.
review.comment_negative: by now I really did not find any thing I would dislike Unfortunately I see as well that the booking.com,has not changed it`s BS. rating policy according to real customer such as myself but just some one who for any reason was not satisfied with something and out of anger or frustration write some negative review which cause a big impact of a family business,but as by evidence since early 2000 I sent documents to booking.com to improve their services,they just ignored but now with their own new rating system cause more harm than being useful at all. I will always stay fair to real quality & service. Those who are not agree shall try few other places and compare or simply stay at home.

review.rating: Excellent stay with hospitality and helpful staff
review.comment_positive: The entire property is extremely well-maintained. They provide me a very safety room, which is a nice feeling. The check-in and formalities were handled accurately and professionally. We were greeted with free welcome water. The room is spacious, spotless and with coffee, tea, a speed kettle, a hair dryer are provided inside the room and several packages of toiletries are there as well. The wifi works very perfectly. There is a shoes-off policy before go up stairs and it gives you a nice feeling of home when walking barefoot. The location is perfect because the house is in a parallel street of the busy and noisy Backpacker street and can be reached easily. You are instantly at this vibrant tourist street but at the same time live in a kind of quiet area. Downtown is 15min away by foot and several bus stations are only 1 min away. We definitely recommend THE WHITE HOUSE for everyone who is travelling around and spending some time in Ho Chi Minh City on a fair budget. Thanks for the superb stay!!

I highly recommend this place if you travel on budget but want a comfortable, clean and safe room of your own.

review.rating: The place to be for your stay in Ho Chi Minh city
review.comment_positive:
The staff was super friendly and helpful! He helped us with everything we needed (bus to Cat Tien, bus to Phnom Penh, tour to the Cu Chi tunnels) and tried to get us the best prices possible. We also got our loundry done (35000/kg) and we were able to stay an extra night even though we hadn't booked it. When we wanted to stay another extra night, the hotel was full, but he arranged us a room for the same price in the hotel next door.
The room itself was very clean and comfortable.
I would definitely recommend this hotel for your stay in Ho Chi Minh city!

On nous a dit que malheureusement c'était à cause du weekend,mais le lundi c'était de forts bruits de rue,mais restant moins forts que le bruit du weekend. However, the best part of this property is the family that runs it, they are so kind and helpful and arranged everything for us. I cannot recommend the White House enough!

I was given late checkout, as well as advice on how to progress on my journey and where to stop by during my day in the city. Truly went the extra mile and beyond!

review.comment_positive: Clean and well-soundproofed room

I needed a place to sleep in the evenings as I was out exploring and on excursions during the day.

review.rating: we thoroughly enjoyed our stay at The White House because the staff was exceptional. They go beyond the normal effort to

review.comment_negative: we had no complaints.

review.comment_positive: Het personeel is ontzettend vriendelijk en helpt je met allerlei dingen. Gratis water en bananen als je langs de receptie liep. Het zit vlak achter de main bar street, maar helemaal geen last van geluidsoverlast.

The room was really quiet, clean and had everything we needed.
We would definitely come back and highly recommend staying there.

The person that greeted us to start with catered for us single handedly throughout our stay, including an area map, local restaurant and attraction recommendations and they offer local tours, which unfortunately we chose not to take up.

They were great at organising the taxi service for the end of our stay and made us feel welcome.

The person who greeted us also helped us with our bags on the way in and the way out.

This was no mean feet as there was no lift, marble stairs and a multiple floor climb that I will admit I did not feel safe navigating myself.

The climb also ensured a quiet stay in a busy neighbourhood.
review.comment_negative: No lift, though this was made up for by the hosts helpfulness on the way in and out.

review.comment_positive:

Very welcoming on arrival and had lots of information about tours, restaurants and our onward bus journey. Went above and beyond. Location is amazing, right next to the lively walking street but not too loud for sleeping. The room was lovely and extremely clean. Excellent value and a great place to stay, would recommend to anyone!

Le personnel nous a beaucoup aidé sur des questions pratiques : ils ont appelé pour nous l'opérateur de téléphone car la carte sim que nous avions achetée ne fonctionnait pas, ils nous ont trouvé pour nous le meilleur bus pour aller à Cai Bé et l'ont même réservé. Quant aux adresses, ils ont donné un mélange de hotspots obligatoires, et d'adresses hors des sentiers battus. Enfin, ils ont été honnêtes avec nous : nous avions des doutes sur certaines excursions, et nous en ont déconseillées en fonction de nos goûts. Literie très confortable. Chambre fonctionnelle. Bref, un sans faute. Ils ont été parfaits.

L'hôtel est étonnamment silencieux, dans une petite ruelle, et les clients n'étaient pas bruyants contrairement à tous les hôtels où j'ai été depuis deux mois. Il y a plein de restaurants à tous les prix tout autour  et même un supermarché coop pas loin.
review.comment_negative: Ce n'est pas quelque chose que l'hôtel peut améliorer malheureusement. Le quartier est bourré de touristes, de bars à filles, de karaokés, etc. Cela n'affecte pas du tout le séjour dans l'hôtel lui-même mais disons que les environs immédiats ne sont pas idéaux. Il suffit de s'y préparer psychologiquement et de marcher 500 mètres et tout va bien

We didn't like it at all!

Помимо приятного общения и доброжелательности, нам помогли в ряде важных вопросов. Обязательно вернёмся!

Absolut top Lage. Ruhig und um die Ecke ging die Post ab und man hatte alles, was man braucht. Ausstattung auch top. Super liebe und hilfsbereite Mitarbeiter. Haben uns auch noch ein Taxi zur Trainstation organisiert 30.000 günstiger als Grab.

review.comment_negative: Well, it was only a block from the Buu Vien walking street which is incredibly loud at night, but somehow it was still sheltered enough to be quiet. It was just in an area that had kinds of crazy nightlife and goofy behavior by other touts and people trying to scam tourists

review.comment_positive: Our stay at The White House was absolutely perfect and all credit goes to the wonderful staff who work there. From the house keeping to the front desk our lovely stay was down to all the staff who work so hard. The rooms are spotless, the bed is comfortable and the room has everything you need. The location is great, it’s just down a little side road so you can’t hear the noise of the busy street, we walked everywhere and loved the park just up the road. But again the best thing about our stay were the staff, Tai was the most welcoming and lovely person we have met on our trip and we have been travelling a month. It really was the best welcome we have had at any hotel we have been, he helped us do everything and went above and beyond to make sure we had the best time in his city. There is also a lovely guy who works there in the morning but we forgot to get his name, who is just has welcoming, lovely and again such a hard worker. Everyone here works so hard and honestly can’t express how such lovely people made our stay, I wish every hotel we stayed at had these guys. Ho Chi Minh was amazing and it’s all credit to all the workers at this hotel, will honestly be back just for them! If you are looking for somewhere to stay I 10000% recommend this place not only for the cosy, clean rooms but for the best service.
review.comment_negative: NOTHING! sad we had to leave

Recomendo!

review.rating: Great central location with a marvelous host!
review.comment_positive:
The central figure who made my visit there so awesome is a young man called Tai. 
He is such a decent, friendly, and educated guy who basically managed and arranged everything 24/7: his warm welcome, helpful recommendations on places to visit and eat/drink, his practical advice when I lost my cell phone. To me, this assistance was something that made my stay there worthwhile altogether. Thank you, Tai!

Also, the place is located very central, within an authentically narrow street. Yet very quiet with regard to the street noises.

In the room everything worked perfectly, and was perfectly clean, I felt safe and comfortable throughout.
review.comment_negative: It didn't matter much to me that at the time of my visit there was a somewhat noisier construction site nearby.

review.comment_positive: Không gian trong phòng tạo cảm giác khá dễ chịu, không bị bí bách.

review.comment_negative: Their recommendations can include more HCM specific foods. Their list provided had very general Vietnamese food like bun cha and bun bo hue that aren't HCMC foods. We had to do our own research a lot for foods and ask them where to get it.

If you want to be close to walking street, this is definitely a place to stay, for it's only a 1 minute walk and it's not noise when you want an early night in.
review.comment_negative: The only problem we had, was that the bed was way to hard for us, but we found this at nearly all of the places we stayed at in Vietnam.

We did that and a young man let us in and took us to our room. He showed us how everything worked and said we can sort out the money in the morning. Location is close to cafes and bars. Bathroom was good too. Bed was comfortable.

review.comment_positive: I liked everything! The hotel is in the centre of city. This area is very busy but hotel is situated in a small side street so you don’t hear the noise. I had a room on the first floor. The room is really small but you have everything you need. It’s renovated and very clean. Bathroom is new as well so you don’t feel any inconvenience or smell. Water pressure is good. Bed is comfortable. Staff is great!! Very helpful!! When I checked out I had left my sub glasses. One of the guys called in 2 minutes after I left and organised delivery for me via special app. Thank you!!
review.comment_negative: The AC could be stronger.

review.comment_positive: Super clean, massive comfy bed, easy walking distance from most attractions. We also enjoyed the tour we booked through front desk. :)

Excellent, will stay definitely again

Sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend. Mega sauberes Zimmer. Geniale Lage wenn man abends raus will.
The location is close to the party street (but still quiet) and very close to Giant ibis bus station. Perfect if you have an early bus to catch! The owner is so welcoming and friendly!
The host was very friendly, the room was small, but spotlessly clean and quiet, and the location great. Very easy to walk to main attractions and to the bus station for Da Lat.
Todo excelente. Personal fantástico y muy simpático. Terraza increible.

Chambre calme
Douche très pratique
Proche de toute commodités
Personnel d'une gentillesse incroyable
L'emplacement
review.comment_negative: La chambre est petite et il n'y a pas d'ascenseur

review.comment_positive: Being next to a party street there was NO noise at all. Not even a little bit. Very close to everything that is needed. Tours pick you up from the hotel and the receptionist was very nice. He can help booking buses or tours. We drop our laundry and was clean and dry the day after so really convenient.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: Bardzo fajny hotel z przyjazną obsługa. W niedalekiej odległości od głośnej Bui Vien. Mimo to nie jest hałaśliwie. Można płacić kartą. Przyjaźna i bardzo pomocna obsługa. Jest możliwość przechowania bagażu przed wieczornym wylotem. Można też wziąć prysznic. Recepcjonista zamówi także taksówkę na lotnisko w korzystnej cenie. Jeśli wrócę do Wietnamu na pewno odwiedzę ponownie.

The room was clean and tidy, had the deluxe comfortable double bed. When resting in the hotel I had plenty of tv channels to rest and relax watching after a big day of travelling the city. A nice cool mini fridge for a few snacks and drinks.
Great location and helpful with recommendations and booking transport

Een hele goede prijs kwaliteit verhouding. Erg centraal gelegen zonder last te hebben van de uitgaansgelegenheden. Heel vriendelijk personeel met goede tips en bereid om je te helpen. Zeker een aanrader

the room is nice and quiet, and receives some natural lighting from a window between two buildings (so no view). the staff are friendly helpful and responsive. I would stay again, and would recommend to others to stay.
review.comment_negative: while not an issue for us, there is no lift.

review.comment_positive: The location was close to many attractions in HCMC. The staff were very caring and helpful with lots of tips and support, including booking a tour for us and helping with our sim cards. They went above and beyond to make sure our stay was pleasant! The room was clean and quiet. Great value for money. I couldn't recommend it highly enough!

Great hotel, comfortable bed, small room but with everything I needed. Very helpful, friendly, English-speaking staff. 
Just off Bui Ven walking street, but no noise penetrated.
review.comment_negative:
Don't expect a view from your window.
HCMC is a marmite experience (and I fell into the hate it category) but this had nothing to do with the quality of the hotel, which, for the price, is a solid 9/10.

review.comment_positive:
Nice bed, super comfortable. Very helpful staff. I was a bit sick when I got there and they gave me the option to choose the room. 
It's super close to the street with all the bars and i was afraid it was gonna be noisy, but actually it's very silent.
review.comment_negative: Room is small, but you don't need more than that.

review.comment_positive: Friendly staff

review.rating: My go-to hotel for all future visits 100%!
review.comment_positive: The two gentlemen ("staff") with whom I had the pleasure of interacting went out of their way, literally, to ensure I had everything I needed and was comfortable, both at the hotel and getting around.  100% perfect!  Couldn't have asked for more!  The room was excellent, great bed, great shower, quiet, relaxing and super location.
review.comment_negative: Absolutely nothing to note about dislikes.  Everything was excellent!

review.comment_positive:
Struttura molto pulita, la stanza era confortevole.
Ciò che caratterizza la struttura è la gentilezza del proprietario, sempre pronto a soddisfare ogni nostra richiesta.
review.comment_negative: Trovandosi nella via adiacente alla walking street, di notte si sentiva il rumore proveniente dai vari locali.

review.comment_positive: Family run business, greeting on arrival very welcoming. Very helpful to all our inquiries, such greet host definitely would recommend.

review.rating: Günstige und ruhige Unterkunft im Großstadttrubel
review.comment_positive: Mitten im Geschehen, trotzdem leise Unterkunft. Sehr freundliches und hilfsbereites Personal.

Communication prior to our trip was good, and when we arrived at 7am from the night train we were immediately made to feel very welcome with smiles, chilled water.and plenty of info. Throughout our stay the receptionist was extremely helpful and flexible, allowing us to use one of our rooms well beyond checkout time due to our late flight and securing us a discount for our Grab taxi! Our bedrooms were not huge but were modern with big comfy beds. Our bathrooms were spacious and the showers very good with hot water. The location of the hotel is perfect too. All in all great value!
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.comment_positive: Tout était parfait
Very friendly owner. Introduced us attractions & food. He also helped us with our bus booking. There's a futa office nearby & we need not take a cab to the main terminal to board the bus.
チェックイン時、チェックアウト時に冷えた飲料水を貰えたのが嬉しかったです。終始、気持ちの良い対応をしていただきました。お部屋も清潔で、日当たりも良く、とても過ごしやすいホテルでした。
review.comment_negative: 夜は、裏の通りの治安があまりよろしくありません。

review.comment_positive: Sehr saubere Zimmer an sehr zentraler Lage. Das Hotel wird von einer unglaublich freundlichen und hilfsbereiten Familie geführt, die sich alle sehr um dein Wohlergehen bemühen.

Bardzo polecam ten nocleg! Było bardzo czysto i ładnie. Obsługa była bardzo miła i pomocna. Z hotelu zorganizowano nam wycieczkę do tuneli Cu Chi, którą mogę zdecydowanie polecić. Mimo tego, że hotel zlokalizowany w samym centrum, w pokoju było bardzo cicho.
review.comment_negative: Wszystko mi się podobało :)

review.comment_positive:
The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The room is very clean with big bed and nice bathroom. Overall the hotel is very safe even in the busy area.

Extra thanks to the man at the reception :)
review.comment_negative: Nothing :)

review.comment_positive:
This was a great place to stay, impeccably clean, super well located, comfortable bed and pillow (it felt great to get a good night’s sleep), aircon and Wi-Fi that works and most of all, the people who run it. I had booked for 4 nights and ended up extending it to 9 nights, partly because of the National holiday which made it inconvenient to travel, but mostly because it felt like a home away from home, very warm and welcoming. I’ve been traveling for 2 months now, in 4 countries and this is the nicest place yet.
First greeted by Ngoc, she is sweet and cares to make sure your stay is a good one. When she left on holiday, Tai the manager’s son took her place and was both extra friendly and helpful with recommendations and assistance in booking tickets for anything, including flights. He even took my luggage over to the taxi when I was leaving for the airport (cars cannot turn down the narrow street, only motorcycles). He clearly cares about his guests and the quality of the service given is top-notch.
I had booked a Superior Double Room and was upgraded to a Deluxe Room, a 3rd floor walk-up, but worth the climb, it was luminous and cozy. From what I saw of the other rooms, they are also lovely. It has a western-style bathroom with glassed-in shower (sliding door) that looks exactly as on the photos and always has hot water. They offer laundry service, a the mini fridge and small table and chairs.  The room has plenty of plugs for charging electronic devices.
It is located in District 1, near Bui Vien in the Backpacker area which can be quite loud, the hotel is tucked away on a side street (a ‘hem’) and you can only hear sound in the distance. Unless you are a very light sleeper, it shouldn’t keep you awake, and earplugs would take care of that. It is conveniently located for walking to the main attractions, and two streets away from the bus terminal.
Really amazing stay, I’d go back. In fact, I wish I could take it and them with me to my other destinations.
review.comment_negative:
Nothing bad to say. 
One suggestion for improvement, and it’s negligible, is that although there are plugs next to the bed to charge devices, there is not enough space for nightstands which are useful for cell phone, glasses, book, etc. I’d add flip-down shelves that are screwed into the wall so people who would want to use them could flip them down, otherwise, they’d stay up and out of the way. It’s a small detail. I got around it by placing my roller luggage next to the bed and using it as my nightstand.

review.comment_positive:
We really enjoyed our stay here (2 nights).
The room was clean and with enough space to store our stuff. The guy at the reception was always helpful and kind. We were on the 3rd floor and there was no elevator, but it's fine.
The location is also good.

The room was clean, comfy and the bathroom was very modern. 
The staff where extremely friendly and helped us organise our trips and transport.

부이비엔거리 골몰쯤
조용하고 친절함
깨끗
review.comment_negative: 헤어드라이어가 너무 약항

review.comment_positive: Convenient and central location, friendly and supportive staff, easy access to things one might want to see and experience.
review.comment_negative: Can't really fault the place.

review.comment_positive:
I liked the attitude of the family mother and two sons . They were so wellcoming me and cared for me. I felt safety there like I'm at home.  You.can  ask them and they will help you , They cleaned the room when I had asked them, The room has a window and hot water with strong pressure.
Location is very good and same time its not noise in the room .
They have a landry survice , Its a reasonable price.
review.comment_negative: I cant complain for anything.

review.rating: Super Service, Preis-Leistung top, sympathische Gastgeber
review.comment_positive: Sehr hilfsbereites Personal, sehr sauber, gute Lage. Trotz Nähe zur Bui Vien Str.ziemlich ruhig, wir konnten gut schlafen. Gepäckaufbewahrung möglich ohne Probleme.
review.comment_negative: Zimmer eher klein.

review.comment_positive:
Personale molto accogliente e disponibile, ci hanno indicato cosa fare e cosa vedere, ci hanno prenotato il tour del delta del Mekong, ci hanno prenotato un taxi conveniente per l'aeroporto.
Camera piccola ma essenziale e soprattutto pulita.
review.comment_negative: Sono iniziati i lavori alle 7 del mattino e c'è stato molto rumore, ma non credo questo dipenda effettivamente dalla struttura

review.comment_positive: Absolument tout . Chambre et salle de bain neuve et très propre. Les gérants de l'hôtel sont adorables et font tout pour vous aider .
櫃檯人員非常親切
great value, friendly staff, we would stay here again.
A well located hotel although it was a little difficult to find in its alley off the main street initially. Reception helped us book tours of the Mekong and Chu Chi tunnels which was lovely of them.

review.rating: Très bon homestay au centre de Ho Chi Minh ville
review.comment_positive: L'emplacement au centre de HCM, le personnel gentil et donnant des conseils, la chambre conforme à nos attentes
review.comment_negative: Tout était bien

review.comment_positive:
Very friendly staff and clean room.

Sehr freundliche und hilfreiche Mitarbeiter und sauberes Zimmer.

Malý funkční hotel v blízkosti centra a restaurací a barů. Ochotný personál, možný check-in i v noci/ráno. Pokoj dostačující pro přespání, prosklení do světlíku. Koupelna malá, ale stačí. 
Čisto a postele pohodlné.
Great location near Beer Street, but quiet because it’s on a side street. Nice and clean rooms. Staff was really helpful and kind.
review.comment_negative: The charge for me to have a late check out was almost the price of another full night, which was disappointing.

review.rating: Good staff and value for money
review.comment_positive: Good staff and value for money

Super freundliche und hilfsbereite Leute. Ich bin mehrmals hierher zurück gekommen und konnte meinen Koffer unterstellen. Vielen Dank. Einfach, sauber und top Lage.
review.comment_negative: Die Umgebung ist sehr laut, also nichts für zarte Ohren. Mit Ohrstöpseln wars für mich OK.

review.comment_positive: Tout  accueil  propreté  le calme  Tout en  étant  pas loin de la  walking street  personnel adorable  toujours  près à rendre  service

review.comment_positive: Tai and his family take great care of their guests.

The room was very clean, bed and pillows very comfortable. Thai was amazing, he helped us with anything we needed. The position was great, very close to main to Buvien street and  markets. I highly recommend you this place.
The staff members were very helpful and polite. The room was clean and comfortable.
review.comment_negative: The noises from the street were very loud.

review.comment_positive: Nhân viên lễ tân khá vui vẻ và trả lời các câu hỏi của gia đình.

review.rating: Good option for travellers who want budget, good staff and great location
review.comment_positive: Staff and host was good and helpful. Located centrally, but not so noisy.

review.comment_positive: 整體大致上很乾淨  也有對外空間，旅館人員熱情親切 很用心，可惜隔音設備較差但整體性能價格比例算是中上水準

review.comment_positive: The beds were so comfortable and the hotel very clean, with friendly and helpful staff.

review.comment_positive: Excellent location. Excellent helpful and friendly staff which can help you make the most of your time in Saigon. Good value for money. Comfortable budget room.
review.comment_negative: I personally would have preferred a shower and not a wet room

review.comment_positive: Khách sạn đáp ứng được các nhu cầu cơ bản nhất của nhóm bạn trẻ.

Bardzo pomocny personel. Pan z recepcji daje cenne wskazówki dotyczące jedzenia, atrakcji, korzystnej wymiany walut.
Nieodpłatna możliwość zostawienia bagażu (nawet na cały dzień) po wymeldowaniu. 
Pomimo bardzo bliskiej odległości Bui Vien w pokoju było naprawdę cicho.
Panuje tutaj przyjemna, rodzinna atmosfera 🙂

Extremly helpful Host! We had an amazing time
スタッフの対応。値段。
review.comment_negative: 周りの騒音。

review.comment_positive: Tai is so great man, he helped me contact and find very important documents I forgot at the hotel in Hue. The room was very clean and comfortable. Initially I stayed for 3 nights but then stayed for 3 more nights. It was a bit unfortunate because on the 4th night, the room was fully booked. Next time, I return to Ho Chi Minh City for travelling, I will definitely come back here.

Hotel situé dans une petite rue au calme de la très animée rue Bui Vien située juste à côté.
Le personnel est très sympathique et prévenant, et fera tout pour que votre séjour à Ho Chi Minh soit le plus agréable possible. J'ai particulièrement apprécié les suggestions de restaurants à proximité (ils étaient vraiment bons!), et les indications pour les bus que je ne trouvaient nul part ailleurs.
La chambre était très propre et bien équipée, et la literie confortable.

Merci encore pour votre accueil!

review.rating: Face à la fureur de saison
review.comment_positive:
Emplacement parfait à une centaine de mètres de walking street avec tous ces bars et restaurants dans une rue hyper calme 
Accueil et accompagnement parfait 
Réservation pour les tunnels de cu chi nickel 
L hôte a toujours été de bon conseil et serviable
review.comment_negative: Rien

review.comment_positive: Location, airco  WiFi, bed and the shower...all great
review.comment_negative:
Shower floor was slippery when wet, so care needs to be taken.

review.comment_positive:
la habitacion súper limpia, nos dieron una mas grande de la que habíamos reservado al mismo precio. 
tanto el hijo como la madre dueños del hostal son súper majos. el hijo habla muy bien inglés y te ayuda y recomienda un montón de cosas

The staff of the accommodation is very friendly and helpful. Great service arranging transport.

review.comment_positive: Good for a short stay, the receptionist is very helpful and polite. Goes out of their way to help.
review.comment_negative: Nothing but do inform that cars can’t go in as it’s in a small alley but walking distance isn’t far from where the car has to park

review.comment_positive: Everything! Tai made me feel so welcome and he is such a genuinely nice guy. He booked my tours and helped me get the best rates, find the best things to do. I will definitely book in the same place when I come back! You are an amazing person Tai! See you soon!

review.rating: Very friendly and kind staffs, convenient location for drink.
review.comment_positive: The staffs are very helpful. I had heavy luggages, they helped me to carry to the room, load on the car etc.
review.comment_negative: No lift, but the staffs help me out.

review.comment_positive:
De vriendelijkheid van het personeel was absoluut top. Ze helpen je met alles. 2 mooie excursies gedaan via het hotel. 
Mooie en comfortabele kamers zonder last te hebben van geluidsoverlast.
The staff was extremely friendly and helpfull.

review.rating: Good stay to explore the city
review.comment_positive: The receptionist was super helpful and friendly. The rooms were very tidy and clean.

review.rating: una estancia excelente, súper bien ubicado con instalaciones muy buenas u confortables y personal de lujo!!! definitivam
review.comment_positive: excelente Todo, las instalaciones, la ubicación y el personal que soluciona y orienta con todo lo que necesitas!! son geniales!

review.comment_positive:
El hotel es excelente!
Super bien ubicado,  cerca de todos los bares!
Habitación muy buena, todos los días limpieza y toallas limpias! También artículos de baño todos los dias
La atención del personal 10 puntos 
Recomiendo 100% a la comunidad viajera, volveré a ho chi minh y a este hotel.

Owner was AMAZING. Very friendly. We booked for one night and immediately tried to extend an additional 2 nights (very clean, simple room. Perfect) but the hotel was unfortunately full. Our following hotel could not help us with travel bookings and general information so we went back to the White Guest House and asked for assistance. He helped us with everything and exchanged contact details so that we would have a translator if we encountered problems with the bus service to Can Tho. We actually were happy to have his help as there was a small hiccup in the transfer. We will try to stay here on our outbound night in HCMC.
La hospitalidad de los propietarios es lo mejor sin duda.
review.comment_negative: Todo perfecto

review.comment_positive: Excellent location right near the nightlife of the city whilst also being quiet. Very comfortable bed with good aircon. Best of all the staff were so helpful. They even let us leave our stuff after we checked out and freshen up before our flight.
review.comment_negative: Nothing, they were brilliant!

review.comment_positive: Sehr gutes Zimmer für ein paar Nächte in HCMC! Direkt mittendrin im Stadtzentrum. Total nettes Personal, das mit allem gerne hilft. Sauberes Zimmer. Bequemes Bett. Keine lauten Straßengeräusche trotz der Nähe zur Party Straße! Würde direkt wieder buchen. :)

Tai was an absolutely amazing host and took care of us at all times, offering great advice about Vietnam and tour bookings.
Rooms clean, great working aircon and held bags when we had to check out before leaving for the airport.
Easy location with many sights and restaurants nearby.
review.comment_negative: There was nothing in the stay which I could say was negative.

review.comment_positive: Rent och snyggt rum, mycket hjälpsam personal som bland annat fixade billig taxi till flygplatsen.
review.comment_negative: Lite svårt att hitta till första gången, beläget i smal gränd.

review.comment_negative: Everything was great!

review.comment_positive: The staff is extremely helpful and friendly. The second I stepped in in the hotel, I felt safe (contrary to the overwhelming airport) and this really helped to kickstart an amazing journey in an amazing country.
Super aardige gaat die alles wist te regelen, simkaart en goede tips had voor het eten. Top locatie en fijn bed.
review.comment_negative: Niets

- Great central location 
- Really nice bathroom
review.comment_negative: - No breakfast provided but staff helped find good local options for breakfast

review.comment_positive: Brilliant staff. Helped with everything. Arranged tours. Booked my train ticket. Planned my trip with me. Very dedicated, trustworthy, smart young man who went above and beyond what was expected. Convenient location. Very clean rooms. I definitely recommend.
review.comment_negative: It is a guesthouse. Visitors should not expect luxury. What they can expect is lovely and very helpful staff, very clean and comfortable rooms.

review.comment_positive: I had a very nice stay in here, Tai is very helpful and friendly, he recommended me many places to visit and eat tasty Vietnamese food, include vegan food. My room was in the 3rd floor, so it is very tranquil and daily clean. Definitely, I will come back here when I return HCMC for travelling.
Exceptionally clean room and helpful front desk manager. The manager went out of his way to assist my friend and I throughout our stay for ease and comfort. For the price, this place is exceptional.
review.comment_negative: In the heart of a party area, but the street was very quiet.

review.comment_positive: Great central location, clean room and the staff was the best. Tai gave lots of great recommendations and was so friendly and nice. Would love to stay here again!

review.rating: Best little guest house in HCMC

Love this place.
very close to Main Street and no noise . Staff is excellent and very helpful  -24/7 restaurant close by
review.comment_negative: not applicable

review.comment_positive: Very central and close to walking street. The accommodation was quiet at night you didn't hear the music. Owners were very accommodating and informative. Guest house was lovely and clean. We would highly recommend and if we return we wouldn't hesitate to book.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: Calidad precio fantástico. Tanto la recepción como la habitación estaban impecables, muy limpio. También destacaría la buena localización y la amabilidad de los dueños. No se puede pedir más por el precio.
review.comment_negative: Todo bien.

review.comment_positive:
スタッフの方がめっちゃ親切でした！到着してホテル近隣の美味しい食べ物や協会などの開閉の時間を紙で教えてくださいました！お部屋もシャワーの使い方など丁寧に教えてくださいました。
シャワーしても水漏れする心配もなかった。
海外ではトイレとシャワーが同じなのはどこでも同じなので不便さはなかった。シャワーも冷温調節がしっかりできる。
review.comment_negative: ドライヤーのサイズがとても小さく、風量も弱く乾くのに時間がかかる。

review.comment_positive: Very clean room, good location, and incredibly lovely stuff—super helpful and accommodating. Would definitely stay again.
review.comment_negative: our stay was perfect

Lo staff è molto gentile e disponibile ad aiutarvi ad organizzare il soggiorno.

The staff was extremely polite and helpful. The rooms were proper and clean, with clean toilets. The location is great, very close to Buen Vien or the party street. Other attractions like Reunification palace and War Museum are also close by.

Great location, near Bui Vien and accessible distance from places of interest. Rooms are basic but are comfortable! The staff were very very helpful, honest and provided everything we needed. They even booked us a transfer to the airport with a better rate.
review.comment_negative: Nothing really

review.comment_negative: Tot estava molt bé.

review.rating: Sehr netter Aufenthalt mit sehr hilfreichem Personal. Würde definitiv wieder hier buchen.
review.comment_positive: Sehr nettes und unterstützendes Personal
review.comment_negative: Badezimmer hätte sauberer sein können.

review.comment_negative: Nogal een vieze buurt. Kleine kamer.

review.comment_positive: Äußerst hilfreicher Mitarbeiter am Empfang, der keine Fragen offen ließ und stets hilfsbereit war. Lage top und sehr zentral.

review.comment_positive: Truly exceptional hotel in a perfect location. The staff are brilliant and had my phone charger sent to the airport after I omitted to pack it. Having a no shoes policy throughout the hotel keeps it exceptionally clean. The rooms are quiet and well lit.
review.comment_negative: The rooms are not massive but are adequately sized and appropriate for the price. Don't expect a view, but with a view would come noise. And this hotel is quiet.

review.comment_positive: Localización. Limpieza. Servicio.
review.comment_negative: La habitación exterior es algo ruidosa por la noche porque se escuchan los pubs de la calle Bui Vien.

review.rating: Felt like home away from home
review.comment_positive: Very friendly and helpful staff, clean room, excellent location, great value
review.comment_negative: My room was small but okay as a solo traveler.

review.comment_positive: Sehr Sauber
It's a family hotel. The staff goes the extra mile for you and has some very good tips regarding HCMC. Especially Tai from the staff was very helpful!
review.comment_negative: The rooms are quite small, but they make goed use of all the available space. It's good value for money!

review.comment_positive:
Basic but very nice place! Perfect location. in the middle of everything but still quite. 
Amazingly friendly and helpful team.
review.comment_negative: nothing. everything perfect

review.comment_positive: The place is similar to a reallly nice western standards hotel plus the fact that it’s located in the best location in the center near everything. I felt safe and comfortable during the entire time. it’s also very clean and up to date.

Clean and cozy rooms with everything you need. Location is very central, but quiet at night. The young host and his family made us feel like home and helped us organize trips and transfer. thanks and coming back for sure

Alles. Die Lage, Sauberkeit, Personal. 
Wir waren begeistert.

It is a great place to explore the center of HCMC. 
The staff is very friendly and gave us good recommendations :)

Good and clean room. Would recommend!
great location, safe, clean and very comfortable.

Amazing staf. Organised the nightbus for us and explained what to do in the city. The hotel has a great location. Everything is on walking distence, but just far away that you won't hear the music from the party street, so perfect. Nice decent rooms.

We could use their shower before we got into the nightbus, even though we had already checked out.

We had perfect stay with really kind and helpful staff. They gave us many recommendations for travelling in Vietnam. Our room was too spotless and massive. Additionally, our mattress was very soft and comfortable. Overall, we had perfect stay in this house, definitely, we are going to come back here in next times.
So clean, hot water, great location and staff could not do enough for you

Despite being close to action, It is surprisingly really quiet at the guesthouse. It's easy to walk everywhere. There are many restaurants and coffee shops around. It is a good place to really see the day to day life. The host is really friendly.
La propreté, la gentillesse du personnel
review.comment_negative: L'exiguïté des chambres, les escaliers, pas de déjeuner et le fait que c dans un quartier de sorties nocturnes

review.rating: Convenient stay in the heart of Saigon
review.comment_positive: We had a wonderful stay in The White House. The hosts made us feel super welcome and took care of everything - scooter rental, taxi booking, tickets to the Mekong, etc. The room was relatively small but spotlessly clean, and the bed was comfortable - we slept like babies. All in all we would highly recommend this place.
review.comment_negative: It's not a negative aspect, but a small note - the location is central but in between of party streets.

review.comment_positive: Nous avons passé une très bonne nuit dans the White House, la literie est très bonne, le gérant est très accueillant et de supers conseils.

1. 벌레가 없음. 개미 조차 본 적 없음.
2. 직원분이 너무너무너무너무 친절함. 항상 웃으면서 맞이해주시고 근처 관광지, 맛집 소개도 해주시고, 짐이 무거워 보이면 달려와서 도와주심. 마지막 공항갈때도 타이씨가 배웅해주시고 짐 옮기는 것도 도와주심. 너무 친절하셔서 인상깊음. 이름을 한 분께만 물어봐서 다른 한 분 성함은 모르지만 두분 모두 다 친절하셨음.
3. 깨끗함. 외관도 내관도 깨끗함. 
4. 낮이나 밤이나 조용함. 여행자거리 옆임에도 소음이 전혀 안들려서 꿀잠 잠.
5. 위치가 좋음. 주변에 관광지가 가깝고, 버스 정류장도 가까움. 맛집도 가까움. 편의점도 가까움. 코 앞임.
6. 직원분이 영어를 잘하고 눈치가 빠르심. 내 짧고 부족한 영어를 바로 알아들으시고 도와주심.
7. 침대도 커서 너무 편했음.
강추!! 다음에도 다시 방문할 예정!!
review.comment_negative: 엘리베이터가 없다. 하지만 짐을 옮기는데 직원분들이 도와주셔서 불편함 없이 잘 지냄.

review.comment_positive: God service, gode senger

review.rating: Buen hotel con una calidad-precio muy correcta
review.comment_positive: Buena ubicación muy centrica y bien aislado del ruido.
review.comment_negative: Nada , en general esta muy bien

review.comment_positive: Die Hosts sind sehr aufmerksam,  freundlich und hilfsbereit. Lage ist zentral und trotzdem ruhig. Das Zimmer ist sauber und verfügt über ein sehr schönes Bad. Gerne wieder.
review.comment_negative: Nichts.

review.rating: Petit hôtel tranquille propre et simple.
review.comment_positive: Très bien situé. Quartier vivant disposant de toute commodités. Le personnel est très sympathique à l'écoute et serviable.

review.rating: A good stay for savy travellers
review.comment_positive: Very welcoming and accommodating staff. It was very affordable and clean. Hygienic and well kept. Had all the basics. Would recommend to those on a budget!

Nuestra estancia fue muy bien. El personal muy atento, con recomendaciones variadas. Facilidades para dejar equipaje antes del chek-in. Habitación limpia y correcta. La ubicación es buena, cerca del centro y con una casa de cambio muy cerca con condiciones buenísimas!!!! Recomendaría este alojamiento, tanto para ir con amigos como en pareja.
review.comment_negative: Nada negativo que recalcar.

review.comment_positive: Staff are super friendly and helpful, room is very clean, great value for money
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: Super lokalizacja, przemiła obsługa, naprawdę nie mogliśmy trafić lepiej.
review.comment_negative: Nic

review.comment_positive: This is a great little boutique hotel in an ideal location in HCMC.  The price is remarkably low considering how nice the rooms are.  This place has lots of amenities that other budget hotels don't have, like a fridge, a kettle, free coffee, etc.
review.comment_negative:
As a boutique hotel, the front desk staff took a lot of interest in my trip and always wanted to engage in conversations and try to help me out.  I prefer not to talk to people, so this was not ideal for me.

Also, this property should consider changing their name to something more distinct than "The White House".  
There are about a dozen hotels in HCMC called "White House" or similar.  
If you type "The White House" into a ridesharing app, you will probably end up at the wrong place.

review.comment_positive:
It was one of the best places we have stayed in Vietnam. Is SUPER clean and the family that runs the building are SUPER nice and welcoming. 
It was very easy to walk around the city, we never used GRAB. But we also like to walk a lot during the day.
The host provides very good suggestions for restaurants and places to see. He is very attentive with everyone.
I think is the first place we stayed where the hosts gives you a map and restaurants suggestions. 
Internet worked very well.
We highly recommend the hotel
review.comment_negative: not applicable

review.comment_positive: Helpful staff. Kettle, mini fridge, TV, toiletries in the room. Comfy bed. Located in the city center. Recommended.
Staff were very helpful and friendly (10/10). The place was very clean (10/10). Good air conditioning and hot water. Location is central.
review.comment_negative: It''s a small room for fitting in all your luggage. The mattress was firm and the pillows were a bit inadequate. Would have preferred fluffier or more pillows. More water provided would be nice too. But it's not intended to be a 5 star hotel!

review.comment_positive: Das Bad war ein Traum: sauber, geräumig, Dusche mit Glas abgetrennt; insgesamt sehr sauber, freundliches und hilfsbereites Personal; Matratze war sehr gut und die AC hat super funktioniert. Lage ist auch top, viele Sehenswürdigkeiten zu Fuß erreichbar.
review.comment_negative: Das Hotel liegt in einer Seitengasse und ist daher relativ ruhig; dennoch hört man natürlich den Lärm der Partymeile nebenan, was uns nicht gestört hat, weil wir uns angewöhnt hatten, in Vietnam mit Oropax zu schlafen.

review.comment_positive: Tai is fantastic and smiling host, he gave lots of information about this interesting city. We have been there for 2 nights before and we decided to extend for one more nights so that it is more easy when we had to leave in the early morning at 3AM. Even, he helped us to book a taxi with cheap price at that time. In addition to, our rooms were very quiet, with so soft mattress and pillows that's why we always slept well 😁. Definitely, we will come back and highly recommend this place to everyone 😊.

review.rating: Gute saubere Unterkunft die Zentral gelegen ist.
review.comment_positive: Gute Lage im Distrikt 1; "Dat" war ein sehr freundlicher zuvorkommender Empfang, der uns viel zu den Sehenswürdigkeiten und den damit verbundenen Must-Do's erzählt hat; Sehr sauberes Zimmer und Foyer; Angenehmes Bett
review.comment_negative: Wir waren es in den 3 Wochen gewohnt für jeden Tag Wasser auf dem Zimmer zu haben, was hier leider nicht der Fall war. Auf nachfrage beim "Chef" wurde dieser ab dem Zeitpunkt an sehr unfreundlich und unangenehm, somit das komplette Gegenteil von seinem Mitarbeiter Dat, welcher ein absoluter Vorzeigemitarbeiter war! Leider war es sehr laut im Zimmer, einerseits durch die Kinder der Hotelbesitzer und andererseits durch das laute Knallen der Türen durch andere Hotelgäste.

review.comment_positive: The staff were all so friendly and helpful. They answered questions, provided a local map when I arrived with possible restaurant choices. They suggested places I could shop for specific types of gifts. Arranged a tour that I wanted. It was exceptional service by the staff. The room and facility was clean. The bed was great. I would choose this place again.
review.comment_negative: The only thing I wish, and it is very minor, is that there was a small shelf in the shower to hold soap and shampoo.

review.rating: Die Lage ist sehr gut und das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis hat auch bestimmt
review.comment_positive: Die Lage war sehr gut. Es gab jeden Tag frische Handtücher, und das Zimmer wurde täglich gereinigt.
review.comment_negative: Das Zimmer war etwas zu klein. Der Mitarbeiter an der Rezeption, hat sich zweimal im Ton vergriffen und hat uns bei der Anreise förmlich überfallen mit Informationen und Hausregeln. Wir wollten einfach erst mal aufs Zimmer gehen und uns frisch machen von der langen Reise.

review.comment_positive: Close to the city center and Bui Vien, staff was really helpful with everything we needed - recommended us several places to visit, helped us with booking the bus tickets etc. Great value for money.
very helpfull staff,  very warm and nice. We enjoyed our stay  because of them.
Khách sạn nằm ở khu vực có nhiều hàng quán ăn vặt, tiện cho nhóm.

review.rating: Great place to stay in Saigon!
review.comment_positive: The location of the Hotel is very convenient in terms of reaching every highlight of the city. The special bus station to get / arrive to the airport is only 3 minutes distance walking. The gentlemen on reception are very nice and friendly, always very proactive for providing information and helping with any question we had, they also helped us find the tour services we were looking for. The room itself was good and well equiped. Room and bathroom very clean and tidy. It is also possible to leave your luggage after check out. We felt very comfortable during our stay. We totally recommend this hotel and for sure would come back. Thanks for the service.

This hotel is tucked back away from the main streets. The location is perfect for walking around and exploring the city. it is clean. The bed was very comfortable. The linens were good quality. The friendly staff were happy to help with whatever you need. We had a lovely stay.

A lovely family run guest house, which is safe, comfortable and located in a great part of HCMC. The staff are friendly and accommodating, and great for giving advice and helping with things like booking a taxi. 

It's in a great location, within walking distance of everything I wanted to see in the city, and also close to a bus stop. The area feels safe and there are loads of places to eat nearby and a park within 5 minutes walk.

The hotel was quiet and very comfortable, I slept very well here. The lighting is good and all the fittings were modern. 

I really enjoyed my stay here and will come again if I am in HCMC.

Wouldn’t hesitate to stay again. location great for restaurants etc.

review.rating: Perfect affordable convenient and clean venue
review.comment_positive:
The room was way better than I expected. It was very clean. Toiletries, tea, coffee, fridge, and kettle were provided. It is located in District 1, yet very quiet. No outside party noise was heard. Perfect location. Easy to get to from airport and within walking distance to Bui Vien (walking street - party street) and Ben Thanh Market as well as Notre Dame. 

The owner is very nice and went out of his way to provide recommendations and book me a Grab/Taxi.
La cama era cómoda, la habitación bastante pequeña, pero suficiente si pasas todo el día fuera. Personal amable. Esta a pasos de la calle que en la noche se vuelve peatonal y es todo musica y fiesta.
review.comment_negative: Encontramos una cucaracha en el baño. A diferencia de todos los otros hoteles donde nos alojamos, no nos daban agua sin costo.

review.comment_positive: 立地がよい。スタッフが親切です。
review.comment_negative: トイレとシャワールームの位置

review.comment_positive: Room is simple, super clean, and has everything you need (private bathroom with toiletries, mini fridge, coffee/tea set, complimentary water). Even though it is super close to the party street, I couldn’t hear it at all because this hotel is in a little side alley with great soundproofing. Reception is option 24/7. Staff was super friendly and helpful. Ty made sure I got there ok, and then walked me to my ride when I left to make sure I got picked up ok.  Highly recommend.

review.rating: In the center of Ho Chi Minh
review.comment_positive:
The family is super welcoming, they gave me a super good list of vegetarian restaurants to eat near the facility.
The room was super clean and the location is very central.
Also to travel to the airport they booked me the grab taxi much more convenient.
Thank you very much from the bottom of my heart.
The English was good and helped me out when I left my backpack in the taxi!!!!
Nice staff! Willing to answer all my questions and to provide useful information
Good location, everything is nearby. Very friendly and helpful staff that always greet you with a smile.

Das Zimmer lag sehr gut! Die Bui Vien Straße ist nur eine Straße weiter, also ideal für diejenigen die Party machen wollen (den Partylärm hört man im Zimmer übrigens nicht). Auch kann man die Stadt bequem von hier aus zu Fuß erkunden. Man bekommt viele Tipps, von den Eigentümern, wo man gut einheimisch Essen gehen kann, was man gesehen haben sollte und auch wird einem bei Ausflügen geholfen. Habe mich hier sehr gut gefühlt! Immer wieder gerne!
床很大 房間乾淨 櫃檯很親切

review.rating: Amazing location, amazing hosts - must stay!
review.comment_positive: Fantastic location right off beer street but you can’t hear it at all! Rooms are very clean and the bed is super comfy, we had a great nights sleep. The hosts are so friendly and helpful, they really made our stay! They even woke up at 4am to say goodbye and order us a taxi when we left for the airport. Definitely stay here in HCMC!

review.rating: Great stay in the center of Saigon !
review.comment_positive:
- The owners/staff of the hotel, always so helpful
- The room, very clean and comfortable 
- The central location, close to many good places to eat at any time of the day
Overall an amazing stay, we would definitely come back next time in Saigon !
review.comment_negative: - Even though same day laundry service is amazing, the detergent used was too strong and unfortunately ruined the colors of one of my pants.

review.comment_positive: Muy céntrico y equipado con todo lo necesario para pasar unos días visitando la ciudad. Desde el propio alojamiento ofrecen opciones turísticas imprescindibles y a buen precio como la excursión a los túneles de cuchi o al delta del mekong. El dueño es muy atento y simpático, nos dio buenas recomendaciones y siempre se preocupaba de que estuviéramos bien.
review.comment_negative: No tiene ascensor

review.comment_positive:
The staff were very nice and helpful, especially Tai who had great recommendations, booked our trip to the tunnels, organised laundry and gave us a handy map of recommended sights and restaurants. 
The hotel was very clean, great location, close to the centre but yet quiet.
Really recommend staying there.
review.comment_negative: Only suggestion would be a safety deposit box in the room.

review.comment_positive:
This place is excellent value for money. Big clean room in the middle of all the action but still quite quiet to allow for a good night sleep An easy walk of around 20 minutes to all the major city sites.

What makes this place stand out is the accomodating staff that is always ready to help with planning  your stay and trips outside HCMC. I would gladly stay here again!

The room was clean, airco was great, and the bed was vert comfortable. When we needed anything (for example new towels, help with tours), it was immediately provided. 

We definitely recommend this hotel.

review.rating: All win all a good hotel and you don't go wrong booking it.
review.comment_positive:
The hotel is run by a young family who also lives on the first floor and therefore they are always available for any problems. We were received by a young gentleman and he explained very well what you can experience in the city. Very positive were also the discussions about the onward journey. He could tell us various routes and was always available for a booking. 
The hotel room itself is rather small, but very clean. Everything we needed was available. The bathroom was also very clean. 
The neighborhood is a nightlife district, here you will find many tourists. But you definitely don't hear any of that in the hotel.
review.comment_negative: The location is rather difficult to find, it is in a side street, but that is due to the nature of Saigon's urban planning.

Die Unterkunft liegt in einer kleinen Seitenstraße in unmittelbarer Umgebung der Partymeile. Davon hört man allerdings kaum etwas und wir haben uns auch in der Umgebung immer sicher gefühlt.
Wir durften netterweise am Abreisetag mit sehr später Abreise unser Gepäck dort lassen und noch das Bad für eine Dusche nutzen.
Die Unterkunft ist uneingeschränkt zu empfehlen.

review.rating: A Quiet Stay in the heart of the Action

We did 2 tours that he booked for us with Kim Travel and they were both great - the full day Mekong Delta tour was especially good!  we had some laundry done and he even booked us a taxi to the airport and rolled it all into the bill.

They provided fruit in the morning and organised the washing of some of our clothing as we had 5 nights there. His mum who also worked there gave my wife a couple of genuine lovely hugs which made her feel so welcome. The white towels for drying in the bathroom were also very good as was the bed pillows and linen. The white house was very quiet at night despite being so close to all the action. Well worth the 40 Australian dollars a night.

review.rating: Fantastic hosts in the perfect location

The location is also great and the rooms clean and tidy.
review.comment_negative: The bathroom was a little small but it did not impact on our experience at all :)

review.comment_positive:

Helped us to book trips and transport to our next location, which was cheaper than online.
The room is clean.
The location is very close to the main party street, but the room is surprisingly quiet in the night.

review.comment_positive: Great stay in the center of the city. The rooms are comfortable and extraordinarily clean. This was the cleanest place we stayed in during our trip in Vietnam. The staff is utmost friendly and willing to help. We booked some excursions via the hotel. Furthermore we used the laundry service which was done very fast.  I strongly recommend!

review.rating: Perfect, will definitely recommend the White House to any family or friends who are visiting Vietnam
review.comment_positive:
The staff were exceptional, they went above and beyond all expectations and requirements and were the most helpful hotel staff that I have ever met.

The room was spacious and was very clean, the air con was perfect especially during the heat of the city. The showers were excellent in the room.

The location was very good with only a short walk to all major landmarks/ sightseeing areas throughout the city with plenty of great restaurants/bars in the immediate area.
Absolutely perfect location. The staff is superbly friendly and gives a lot of valuable information. The bed is comfortable, the room clean.
El trato del personal, super amables y con gran disponiblidad
Khách sạn đáp ứng được các nhu cầu cơ bản của nhóm. Khá ổn.

Es hat einfach alles gestimmt.
Die Lage ist sehr zentral und es ist trotzdem ruhig. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wir haben viele Tipps bekommen und Unterstützung bei unserer weiteren Reiseplanung.
Ebenso kann man qualitativ sehr gute Ausflüge und Touren buchen.
Unser Zimmer war ansprechend und mit allem ausgestattet, was man braucht.
Wifi schnell und ohne Unterbrechungen.
review.comment_negative: Wir hatten absolut nichts zu beanstanden.

review.comment_positive: The staff were extremely welcolming and helpful, recommending places to eat, booking excellent tours and transport and even taking me to the right bus office for Mui Ne on departure day. My room was spotless, the bed was large and comfortable, and the shower hot with fluffy towels. This is a modern, quiet oasis just off a noisy bustling area, with lots of places to eat and main sites within walking distance. I would highly recommend a stay here at Tai's lovely family run guesthouse, which offers excellent value for money.

review.comment_positive: Staff went above and beyond to help me during my stay, highly recommend staying here. They provided a list of restaurants and attractions to see and all of them were A tier.

review.rating: Gerne wieder- es war ein super toller Aufenthalt.
review.comment_positive: Ein familienbetriebenes Hotel unmittelbar an der Bui Vien Street und trotzdem in einer ruhigen Seitengasse. In der Nähe befinden sich zahlreiche Shops, Supermarkt, Bars und Restaurants (Backpacker-Viertel). Man wird persönlich, freundlich und in englisch empfangen. Die gesamte Unterkunft ist extrem gepflegt. Das Wlan funktioniert einwandfrei. Im Zimmer befinden sich jeden Tag kostenfrei Tee und Kaffee. Ein kleiner Kühlschrank und ein Fön stehen ebenfalls zur Verfügung. Jederzeit ist ein Ansprechpartner vorhanden. Zudem wird ein Wäscheservice für wenig Geld angeboten. Wir fühlten uns auf Anhieb sehr wohl, weswegen wir immer wieder unseren Aufenthalt verlängerten.
review.comment_negative: Alles war perfekt!

review.comment_positive: Super Unterkunft, sehr sauber, netter Besitzer, der uns auch bei der Buchung von Touren geholfen hatte.
